Description:
Dual Family Living
A magnificent opportunity for the extended family presents itself in this spacious double storey residence and adjoining studio featuring 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 2 kitchens.
Ideal for a home business or separate living quarters for relatives, there is a fully contained and private dwelling on the ground level with a great sized lounge room, modern kitchen, bathroom facilities and a bedroom.
The main residence comes with :
- Three bedrooms (master with walk in robe and full ensuite)
- Three living areas (separate lounge/dining room, family/meals area and upstairs retreat
- Central Kitchen with breakfast bench and space for double fridge
- Ducted heating and Air Conditioning
A total land size of 558m2 allows for a great sized pergola, low maintenance backyard, plenty of shedding/storage space while a large driveway and carport provides room for multiple vehicles, boat or a caravan.
Located within minutes to Westfields Plenty Valley Shopping and dining Precinct, South Morang Rail, local schooling and easy access to High Street with the benefits of Pacific Epping, Costco and Northern Hospital all within reach.
Insights: 4 Tova Court, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2019 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Absolute Class
This very well-presented ex-display home built by Burbank Homes will not disappoint.
Features a large separate lounge, well-appointed hostess kitchen, complete with stone benches, walk in pantry and adjoins the open plan meals/family.
Also boasting four good size bedrooms (full ensuite with bath to master), ducted heating, evaporative cooling and security system. Complete with modern tonings, high ceilings, downlighting and internal access to the double garage with remote.
Outside you'll enjoy the alfresco entertaining area and low maintenance surrounds. Situated only minutes' walk to schools, shops and public transport.

Description:
One last opportunity
This generous 546sqm block is one of only a few blocks remaining in the peaceful tranquility surroundings of Lyndarum Estate. Situated close to Parklands, Lyndarum shops, Epping plaza, Epping Views Primary School as well as Epping train station, there isn't much this block doesn't offer, with spectacular footpath views overlooking Melbourne CBD.
Comparable property sales
The estate agent or agent's representative reasonably believes that fewer than three comparable properties were sold within two kilometers of the property for sale in the last six months.

Description:
Stunning Town Residence in the perfect locale!
$445,000 - $489,000
This stylish contemporary town residence is perfectly positioned facing a nature reserve in the heart of the Aurora town centre. Immaculately kept and near new this beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home has been well maintained and loved since new. Leave the car at home as everything is at your fingertips walk to Coles, Aldi, cafes, restaurants and other specialty stores, Harvest Home primary school and Edgars Creek secondary school, parks, gym, buses, and playgrounds. The open plan kitchen has ample cabinetry, stone benches and S/steel appliances including dishwasher flows on to a light filled spacious living and dining area overlooking the large balcony that is ideal for outdoor entertaining. Other features include 2.7m high ceilings, LED downlights, NBN internet connection, stone benches throughout, Panasonic inverter split system air-cons in all 3 bedrooms and living area, alarm system, video intercom, blinds, instant gas hot water system, 2000litre water tank and garden shed complete the home. Suits first homebuyers and investors alike.
Must be Sold.
Jim Vlahos
0434 382 485
Insights: 11 Calveley Place, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2019 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Your search is over !
An outstanding home, this fantastic property offers an abundance of space, style and a free flowing floor plan. Once you step inside this modern home you will be delighted with the 3 spacious bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIRs. An inviting and stylish kitchen that includes S/S appliances all overlooking the meals, Living and a separate family/lounge.
Features include a double lock up garage with remote and internal access. Add to this an outdoor area that includes alfresco and Pergola all set on 434m2. Close to Schools, shops and transport this ideal home would be suited to the family, 1st home buyers, investors or anyone wanting a great home in a great central Epping location at an affordable price.
One not to miss !
Land Size: 438m2 Approx
House Size: 24 sq approx
Age of Property: 9 yrs
Builder: Burbank
Heating: Ducted
Cooling: Evaporative
Chattels: All fixtures and fittings as inspected
Deposit Terms: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 60 Days
Rental Appraisal: $400 pw approx
Nearest Primary School : Harvest Home PS, Epping Views PS, St Mary of the Cross Mackillop
Nearest Public transport : Bus - edgars Rd 2 mins (357) - Train Epping Railway station

Description:
2-Bedroom Unit - No Body Corporate Fees!
Attention all singles, couples and retirees; this fantastic 2-bedroom home is ready for the taking!
Featuring a large living room, a shared kitchen and meals area, and a low maintenance backyard, don't miss out on this opportunity.
Offering an easy-care living floorplan, the Queen-sized Master and the Double-sized second bedroom both come with built-in-robes, and share a fully-equipped bathroom with a triple shower.
Entering the kitchen you're presented with 600mm stainless-steel appliances, and laminate cabinetry and benchtops. With plenty of storage space and a large pantry, the kitchen flows into an intimate meals area.
Enjoy off-street secure parking with your very own remote-controlled single-car garage that also connects to a carport and a long driveway.
Additional highlights include evaporative cooling and ducted heating, roller shutters on all windows, stylish floorboards throughout, and no body corporate fees!
Great for investors looking for an easily rentable home within a popular location, this property is close to shops, schools and public transportation.
Call Mario Pejovski on 0490815914 - this unit won't be on the market for long!
Features:
2-Bedroom Unit with Built-in-Robes
Fully-equipped Bathroom with Triple Shower
600mm Stainless-steel Appliances + Dishwasher
Laminate Kitchen Cabinetry and Benchtops
Low-maintenance Front and Rear Yards
Evaporative Cooling and Ducted Heating
Stylish Floorboards
Remote-controlled single-car Garage
Carport for additional parking
Roller Shutters on all Windows
No Body Corporate Fees

Description:
NEST OR INVEST IN A FAMILY FRIENDLY LOCATION
Boutique living in a family friendly Lyndarum Estate, this quality built 3- bedroom townhouse delivers minimal upkeep in a premium location close to all the amenities at its doorsteps such as Epping shopping centre, buses, child care, local primary and secondary schools, medical and health facilities, Epping train station, COSTCO, easy access to freeway in a perfect harmony to a coveted lock-up and go lifestyle
with its attractive park frontage. Turn the key to discover a spacious formal lounge, powder room, modern kitchen with walk in pantry, stone bench tops & quality stainless steel appliances overlooking open plan living and dining area leading to a low maintenance courtyard. 
Walk up the stairs and be surprised with spacious master bedroom includes full ensuite, other two bedrooms of generous proportions well served by central bathroom. Other features include heating and cooling, three toilets, double garage and plenty of storage space etc all adds to the homes exciting appeal. An excellent buy for the professional couple, empty nester or investor, this modern marvel also enjoys the benefits of a double garage with right of way access. Inspect today.

Description:
Under Instructions- MUST be sold !
Perfectly located in one of Epping's best locations and close to schools, shops and transport. Be inspired by this exciting 2-storey home that would be the envy of all your family and friends.
Stylish and sophisticated it includes 4 bedrooms plus study; Master has a full ensuite and WIR. Add to this a classy modern kitchen with stone benches, s/s appliances and dishwasher all overlooking the spacious dining, living and a separate lounge all set amongst high ceilings & a double car garage, Features include Ducted heating, refrigerated cooling & ducted vacuum just to name a few
You deserve it!

Description:
Entry level opportunity - Waratah Gardens
This spectacular over-sized apartment is perfectly positioned in the heart of Epping. Residents will enjoy an inner city lifestyle in a more tranquil and serene fashion. Showcasing an open plan kitchen/living area which opens out to a massive north facing balcony, separate lounge/dining area, a large bedroom and a separate main bathroom with its own laundry facilities. Extras include; massive study/home office, secure lock up parking, storage cage, intercom entrance for visitors, quality fittings and loads of natural light. Your inspection will impress with cafes, eateries, local shops and bus services only a hop, skip and a jump away, this unique apartment is surely an ideal proposition for down sizers, investors and first home buyers.

Description:
CONVENIENT FAMILY LIVING
Located in a peaceful pocket of Epping, with only minutes' walk to the Aurora shopping community centre, this beautiful 4 bedroom home will be sure to tick all the boxes for space, simplicity and proximity.
A sunny master bedroom with BIR's and large ensuite greets you at the front of the house, providing welcome peace and privacy when needed. A tiled hallway leads you into an oversized kitchen and open plan living and meals area, brightened up by a large skylight, and expansive long preparation bench, just perfect for family dinners. With lots of extra cupboard and storage facilities, and walk in pantry, this welcoming space is sure to be the focus of many family gatherings. As the warmer weather beckons, take your entertaining outside to an undercover patio area, and low maintenance backyard.
A further 3 spacious bedrooms, all with BIR's and large main bathroom provide plenty of room for a growing family, with an additional rumpus or play room to cater for extra company. With all the additional creature comforts of ducted heating, split system cooling, double lockup garage with internal access, and a thoughtfully placed laundry which steps directly out to the drying area, this home offers everything you need and more.
With only minutes walking distance to Harvest Home Primary School, local shopping precinct, local parks, and close to Hume Highway access, this property is certainly deserving of an immediate inspection.
Insights: 13 Exodus Way, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2019 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Location With Park Frontage
Continue growing your family in this perfectly located home with park frontage in the heart of Epping. This double storey family home affords you the space and comfort that you deserve.
Formal lounge upon entry, with the benefit of a guest bedroom downstairs. A central bathroom, spacious open concept family/living and meals area, great sized kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher and most importantly plenty of bench and storage space for all your needs and wants
Upstairs offers three decent sized bedroom all with built in robes, master bedroom includes walk in robe and an ensuite, an added bonus of a balcony to peacefully enjoy parkland views.
Positioned close to all amenities! Established schools, bus stop, parks and Aurora Village Shopping Centre.
No second thoughts needed, Inspect now!

Description:
Great Family Living in Prime Location!
Perfectly located with all amenities only moments away - a short drive away to Epping train station, Pacific Plaza, Costco and Northern hospital makes this grand home ideal for the growing family. Situated on a generous 512sqm block, giving you and your family a great backyard space to enjoy. Suitable for the astute buyer, this open plan double story home boasts four large bedrooms, two bathrooms, a powder room, three light filled living areas including a retreat area, and a spacious open plan kitchen! Freshly painted, new carpets and new blinds further adds to the very well presented appeal of this beautiful residence. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a large double garage, undercover entertainment area and a good size storage shed. An opportunity too good to be missed!

Great First Home Or Investment!
This brand new home within The Cotters development is complete turnkey and is ready for you to either move in or rent out. Close to schools, Epping shopping Centre, the Northern Hospital and Hume Freeway access the home comprises of 3 bedrooms, central kitchen with stone benchtop, adjoining meals and open plan family area. With split system heating and cooling, timber flooring and an easy to maintain backyard/entertaining area, this affordable property is sure to please. Highlights Include:
- 3 Bedrooms
- Central kitchen (Stone benchtop)
- Spacious meals and family area
- Split system heating
- Split system cooling
- Timber flooring
- Security alarm system
- Rear yard
- Garage (with remote door & Internal access)

Description:
UNDER OFFER - Surprising Space and Family Flexibility
Set on a wonderfully wide block of land, this two-storey home presents a terrific lifestyle opportunity with its versatile floorplan, quality enhancements throughout and popular family-focused location. Light and bright interior comprises four generous bedrooms (downstairs master with WIR and private ensuite) and two additional bathrooms - one on each level. Multiple living zones include formal lounge and dining, rumpus/retreat (upstairs) and spacious open-plan family/meals area accompanied by a stylish granite-bench kitchen complete with soft-close drawers, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights of the home include ducted heating and reverse-cycle air conditioning, full-size laundry and under-stair storage space. Step outside to discover a wide backyard garden including entertaining area with shaded pergola and handy storage shed as well as a front double carport. Family excellence with quiet convenience, it's walking distance to local parks and trails, Findon Road buses, close to popular schools as well as easy access to Epping Station and Pacific Epping Shopping Centre.
Insights: 19 Pentland Drive, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2019 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Your Private Oasis On A Massive 595sqm Block!
An entertainer's dream and a family paradise, if you're looking for a location that offers everything at your fingertips then this beautifully presented home is your next address!
Offering 4 comfortable bedrooms, two with built-in-robes, an updated bathroom, a large kitchen and meals area with 600mm appliances, this home also includes gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
Featuring a sizeable backyard, a large covered entertaining area, and a swimming pool; why would you want to be anywhere else?
The carport can fit two adjacent cars in front of the garage, and also includes a large shed at the back that could be used for storage or as a place to let your hobbies run wild.
Combine all of this with Epping Plaza, Epping train station, cinemas, local parks, and schools all at your fingertips, you have an exciting opportunity awaiting one lucky buyer.
Ideal for first home buyers and investors looking for an easily leasable property call Mario Pejovski on 0490815914 to make this dream haven yours!
Main features:
- Large 595sqm block of land
- 4 Bedrooms; 2 with built-in-robes
- Large formal living area
- Large kitchen/meals area with 600mm appliances and built-in pantry
- Gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- Shed/workshop
- Single car garage and room to park 2 additional cars under carport
- Swimming pool
- BBQ covered area
- Window furnishings on all windows
- Water tank with pump
- Security doors: front and back
- Established gardens: front and back
- Undercover porch area at entry
- Close to schools, shops and public transport
Internal area
204m²

Description:
Great home/Investment in prime location!
A fantastic opportunity to secure a spacious first floor apartment only minutes away from Lyndarum shopping centre, Epping Views primary school, public transport and so much more.
Offering a 2 bedroom apartment, boasting an open plan design that includes a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, glass splash backs and Caesar stone benches flowing onto the meals and lounge room. A central bathroom & laundry, split heating & cooling and a massive private balcony with secure under cover parking.
Features also include off-street and guest parking, cafes, local shops and transport nearby making this an exciting opportunity for 1st home buyers, investors, downsizers and home buyers alike.

Description:
LIVE, INVEST, OR RE-DEVELOP (STCA)
Here is an outstanding and rare opportunity to buy into one of the North's fastest growing corridors, the thriving Epping Activity Zone which allows and encourages increased development possibilities. With the convenience of having everything you need at your door step, walking distance to Epping Train Station, bus services, High St Shopping strip, cafes, eateries, minutes to a good choice both primary and secondary schools, NMIT Polytechnic, Epping Pacific Plaza, COSTCO, Northern Hospital and easy reach to major arterials.
On offer is this well maintained elevated BV family home comprising 3 bedrooms with BIRS, master with semie ensuite and WIR, formal lounge/dining room with soaring cathedral ceilings, well appointed kitchen with 900 mm gas cook top/wall oven adjoining meals area, central family bathroom and separate laundry. Features include ducted heating, air conditioner, quality light fittings and window furnishings, security shutters, terracotta tiled roof, feature wood paneling, covered patio, under house storage, secure lock up garage, low maintenance gardens, all on a substantial parcel of land measuring approx 548 m2 with 18m frontage.
Whether you are buying for living or to rent out, either way this is a solid investment not to be missed

Description:
Dual Living in Central Epping Location
Situated in a quiet court location is this great opportunity to secure two dwellings separately metered on a large allotment within close proximity to local schools, shops and public transport.
This unique floorplan offers 4 bedrooms (3 with BIRs), massive living area with skylights, separate adjoining second lounge, great sized kitchen with glass splashback, adjoining dining, powder room and updated central bathroom.
Added features and benefits include huge covered decked patio with outdoor ceiling fan, double garage with internal access, alarm, heating, evaporative cooling, solar panels, large driveway, multiple sheds and storage.
If that's not enough space for you and the family or perhaps have an elderly relative live with you, consider an adjoining self-contained unit/ 5th bedroom which includes a kitchenette, walk in robe and bathroom.
Sitting on a generous allotment and only moments from South Morang & Epping train stations, Westfield & Epping Plaza and schools and much more, this is a must see!
